name: Today's Amazon Interview Preparation Timetable
values: Deep dive into 'Customer Obsession' and 'Ownership' LPs. Brainstorm 2-3 STAR stories for each.
Solve a LeetCode Hard problem involving Dynamic Programming or Graph Algorithms. Focus on optimal solutions.
Study distributed system concepts: CAP theorem, consistency models, load balancing strategies. Review common design patterns.
Practice answering Amazon LP questions aloud. Record yourself and critically evaluate delivery, conciseness, and STAR structure.
Solve 2 LeetCode Medium problems, focusing on array manipulation and string processing. Implement in preferred language.
Work through a complex system design problem (e.g., Design Twitter, Design a URL Shortener). Focus on trade-offs and scalability.
Conduct a full-length mock interview (behavioral + technical) with a peer or using an online platform. Simulate interview pressure.
Analyze performance from the mock interview. Identify specific areas for improvement in technical skills and behavioral responses.
Based on today's prep, outline key topics for tomorrow. Review Amazon interview guides and common pitfalls.
